enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Chair Stoycheva introduced draft conclusions on the intention of Belarus to use 1990 as its base year under the UNFCCC.
ARGENTINA requested clarification on whether Belarus was applying UNFCCC Article 4.6 (flexibility for EITs), and Chair Stoycheva said this was not the case.

The SBI then adopted the conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2003/L.21). SAUDI ARABIA, for the G-77/China, requested that, pursuant to Rule 10 of the Rules of Procedure, the provisional agenda for SBI-20 and subsequent sessions should include an item on the 'continuing review of the function and operations of the Secretariat,' and requested that this proposal be officially noted in the report of SBI-19.
The SBI took note of the request.
